Relive the magic with this behind the scenes video.

The Clara Lionel Foundation and Ticketmaster team up to fight cancer through August 2. Learn more and get involved. Ticketmaster and Clara Lionel Foundation Team Up to Fight Cancer | Ticketmaster Blog Scoring tickets to a live event you’ve been dreaming of is a great feeling. Ditto for donating to a worthwhile cause. You can do both thanks to our partnership with the Clara Lionel Foundation (CLF), a group supporting cancer treatment in Barbados founded by superstar and altruist Rihanna. Till Augu…

The Clara Lionel Foundation seeks to improve lives in global communities. Learn more at claralionelfoundation.org Rihanna’s Clara Lionel Foundation The Clara Lionel Foundation, founded by Rihanna in 2012, seeks to improve lives in global communities through in the areas of health, eduction, arts, and culture. Learn more and donate to the cause at http://claralionelfoundation.org

Rihanna and her mom stopped by the Queen Elizabeth Hospital during her last visit to Barbados to represent the Clara Lionel Foundation and support the life-saving cancer treatment equipment her foundation donated to the hospital. Photos from Rihanna's post
